catalog_info.title: Vector Space Methods for Differential Equations
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Mathematics 23a,b or 25a,b or Mathematics 19a,b or 21a,b plus any Mathematics course at the 100 level; or an equivalent background in Mathematics.
catalog_info.description: Develops the theory of inner product spaces, both finite-dimensional and infinite-dimensional, and applies it to a variety of ordinary and partial differential equations. Topics: existence and uniqueness theorems, Sturm-Liouville systems, orthogonal polynomials, Fourier series, Fourier and Laplace transforms, eigenvalue problems, and solutions of Laplace's equation and the wave equation in the various coordinate systems.
